name: One Earth
description:
We only have one Earth, and it's dying. Research a way to escape and hopefully find somewhere else, without destroying our only home in the process. 

Full instructions & credits for sourced content are included in the game!

 

Created for GMTK 2019. After hitting a wall on our first idea, we ended up taking "Only One" very seriously and creating our actual submission within 24 hours, with the idea of "Only One" planet and the limited resources that gives you. Not the most mechanical interpretation of the theme, but we ended up creating a neat little card game, though one that could probably do with a lot of balancing. 

Made by seaweeed and rocketfalls.
